about_the_game:
Welcome to the Ghost Bros, an elite team of professionals who investigate ghost sightings, cleanse locations of spiritual activity, and broadcast it all live to an audience across the globe.

Ghost Bros is a 1-4 player co-op ghost investigation simulation game where you and your crew search for proof of the supernatural...and stream it for profit! Travel to real haunted destinations, search for otherworldly apparitions, and build your online audience as you use Ghost Bros branded equipment to document your investigations. Every mission comes with its own mystery to unwind, but follow the protocol and you’ll be fine…unless you make the spirits angry. Try not to do that, okay?

Thank you for making our Kickstarter such an amazing success! Feel free to stay updated on progress by clicking here!

  • Play as different ghost hunting professions, each with unique investigative advantages: Investigator, Medium, Technician, and Historian

  • Voice-controlled NPCs assist your team through voice recognition: leverage the help of your roadie to set up equipment or the team's psychic to gain clues to the entity haunting your location

  • Unlock real world haunted locations: investigate locations like the Pacific Northwest Shanghai Tunnels

  • Too scared to investigate with your friends? Play in the Stream Manager role: Never interacts with the entities directly while offering a streamer-friendly view to manage cameras for both in-game and real-life streaming services like Twitch

Features:

Full Twitch integration lets your Twitch viewers interact with you in game:

  • Viewers can vote on objectives for your team Who will investigate a room alone, who will taunt the ghost, and more.

  • Robust options will allow you to choose how your viewers can interact. Subscribers only, commercial breaks that work in game, subscriber events, and more.

Never play alone! Not unless you want to, of course. Add CPU controlled Ghost Bros team members that can support you in numerous ways. Issue instructions with voice commands to do things like repair cameras, unlock doors, and investigate rooms.

Whether you are in it for the money, the fame, or because you actually want to help people, you are the only person standing between us and what goes bump in the night. Join Ghost Bros today!
